name: Cellular Automaton 2
description:
An improvement over my previous cellular automaton, better performance, larger grids, more cells and better graphics.

Experiment with different cells to see how they evolve over time and how they interact with other cells. Each cell has an unique behavior that can vastly impact the behavior of other cells. Experiment and find out interesting combinations

Controls:

Mouse: 

Leftclick - draw cells

Rightclick - Erase cells

Keyboard (optional):

Space - Toggle simulation
